## Tracking Shrub Abundance and Height Across Time 

How has the abundance of shrubs changed across time, particularly with the occurrence of fire? 

NOTE: Fire Histories for each plot:
ADFA 12 & 22: 1998 (before 1998 plot read), 2021 (KNP)
ADFA 13 & 14: 1998, 2021 (KNP), 2024 (CoffeePot, before 2024 plot read)
CEBE 1-3: 2020 (Castle) only
CEBE 4-6: 2020 (Caste) + 2024 (CoffeePot)
CEBE 7-9: 2024 (CoffeePot) only

### Shrub % Cover across time
#### CEBE
```{r}
#Abundance of shrubs across time (Boxplot for CEBE plots & geom_point for ADFA plots)

#make sure Year is numeric
Points_summarybylifeform$Year <- as.numeric(Points_summarybylifeform$Year)

#boxplot
ggplot(CEBE_summarybylifeform[CEBE_summarybylifeform$Prf..Lifeform=="Shrub", ], aes(x=Monitoring.Status, y=perc_of_hits, fill=FireHistory)) +
  geom_boxplot() + 
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(title='CEBE Plots - Shrub Cover', x='Monitoring Status', y='% Cover') +
  scale_x_discrete(limits= c("Re01Year05", "Re01Year01", "Re02Year01")) +
```

# Shrub Density by Fire History

## Wrangling Density Belts Shrub Data
```{r}
#CEBE specific DensityBelts
CEBE_DensityBelts <- filter(DensityBelts_data, MonitoringType=="BCEBE")

#
CEBE_Densitybyspecies <- DensityBelts_data %>%
  filter(MonitoringType=="BCEBE") %>%
  complete(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, fill=list(Count=0)) %>%
  group_by(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol) %>%
  summarise(totalcnt=sum(Count, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(density.m2=totalcnt/30, density.ac=totalcnt/0.007413) %>%
  merge(., SpList, by="Species.Symbol")
#
CEBE_Densitybyspeciesandstatus <- DensityBelts_data %>%
  filter(MonitoringType=="BCEBE") %>%
  complete(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, Status, fill=list(Count=0)) %>%
  group_by(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, Status) %>%
  summarise(totalcnt=sum(Count, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(density.m2=totalcnt/30, density.ac=totalcnt/0.007413) %>%
  merge(., SpList, by="Species.Symbol")

#
CEBE_Densitybyspeciesandagecl <- DensityBelts_data %>%
  filter(MonitoringType=="BCEBE") %>%
  complete(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, AgeCl, fill=list(Count=0)) %>%
  group_by(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, AgeCl) %>%
  summarise(totalcnt=sum(Count, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(density.m2=totalcnt/30, density.ac=totalcnt/0.007413) %>%
  merge(., SpList, by="Species.Symbol")


CEBE_Densitybyspeciesageclandstatus <- DensityBelts_data %>%
  filter(MonitoringType=="BCEBE") %>%
  complete(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, AgeCl, Status, fill=list(Count=0)) %>%
  group_by(MonitoringType, MacroPlot.Name, FireHistory, Monitoring.Status, Species.Symbol, AgeCl, Status) %>%
  summarise(totalcnt=sum(Count, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(density.m2=totalcnt/30, density.ac=totalcnt/0.007413) %>%
  merge(., SpList, by="Species.Symbol")

```

```{r}
ggplot(CEBE_Densitybyspeciesandstatus[CEBE_Densitybyspeciesandstatus$Species.Symbol=="CEBE1", ], aes(x=FireHistory, y=density.m2, fill=Status)) +
  stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "bar", position="stack") +
  stat_summary(fun.data=mean_se, geom="errorbar", width=0.1) +
  labs(title="CEBE Plots - Mountain Mahogany Density by Species and Status", x="Fire History", y="Average Density (count/m2)", fill="Status") +
  scale_x_discrete(limits=c("Castle", "Castle and CoffeePot", "CoffeePot"), labels = function(x) gsub(" ", "\n", x)) + 
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=14), axis.title.x=element_text(size=20), axis.text.y=element_text(size=14), axis.title.y=element_text(size=20), legend.title=element_text(size=20), legend.text=element_text(size=14), plot.title=element_text(size=20, face="bold")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("D" = "#707070", "L" = "#008B00"), labels=c("D"="Dead", "L"="Live"))
```
